ai-patthana8.67:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.67:1.1_0: Not reciting the Teaching, the three conditions for the sake of reciting the Teaching, ...
ai-patthana8.67:2.1_0: Not reciting the teaching, the cause, the reason for something, it doesn’t arise.
ai-patthana8.67:3.1_0: Not by means of the triple refuge, and the principled and the principled. ...
